definition: Kangxi radical 61 (心) as a vertical side element
slow and patient/chronic (disease)/slow to take effect (e.g. a slow poison)
local bus or train/slow train with many stops

sentences.english: The world is so big, but you only have to slow down and look carefully to see that there is splendor everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 世界这么大，只要慢下脚步，用心去看，处处皆美景。

sentences.english: After dancing merengue, the DJ might play slow music. Some people will dance;
sentences.chinese: 梅伦格舞结束后，DJ可能会放些慢节奏音乐。

sentences.english: The Thames flows rather slowly, which is very favourable for water transportation.
sentences.chinese: 泰晤士河流动得相当慢，十分有利于水路运输。

sentences.english: The isotope of uranium with mass number235, fissionable with slow neutrons.
sentences.chinese: 锕铀铀的同位素，原子质量数为235，与慢。

sentences.english: It does slow you down but I was able to really see each flower.
sentences.chinese: 确实慢下脚步来，而我能够真切地观赏到每一朵花。

sentences.english: No, he doesn't. David swims slower than Jim.
You are much slower than the turtles that flee back and forth in the peanut butter.
sentences.chinese: 你比在花生酱中一群东逃西窜的乌龟还要慢。

sentences.english: This watch looses one minut a day.
sentences.chinese: 这表每天大约慢一分钟。

sentences.english: Even C. elegans worms that wiggle slowly die sooner than worms of the same age that wiggle more quickly.
sentences.chinese: 即便是同期蠕虫，爬得慢的比爬得快的早死。

sentences.english: Slow-loading pages. Prospective buyers won't wait for your pages to load.
sentences.chinese: 网页下载速度慢，潜在购买者会因此离开网站。

sentences.english: The party chatter ebbed away, and the music slowed.
sentences.chinese: 聚会上的闲聊声渐渐远去，音乐也慢了下来。

sentences.english: Very very slow small cherry dining.
sentences.chinese: 小樱桃就餐十分十分慢。

sentences.english: Slow down and walk for one minute.
sentences.chinese: 最后，逐渐慢下速度，走一分钟。

sentences.english: Sedation amnesia and slow induction in pernasal intubation was an effective way for the operation.
sentences.chinese: 镇静健忘慢诱导经鼻插管是一种比较好的方法。

sentences.english: Primary research indicates that deformation mechanism has changed at slow tension.
sentences.chinese: 初步研究表明，慢拉伸时球铁的变形机制发生改变。

sentences.english: Her blood was taking 10 times longer than normal to clot.
sentences.chinese: 她的血液凝结速度比正常情况慢十倍。

definition: slow/unhurried/sluggish/gradual/not tense/relaxed/to postpone/to defer/to stall/to stave off/to revive/to recuperate
to worry/to feel anxious/Taiwan pr. [zhao1 ji2]
can't keep up with/can't catch up with/cannot overtake
low/beneath/to lower (one's head)/to let droop/to hang down/to incline
to increase the specified cruising speed/to pick up speed/to speed up
